title: RF based retinal fundus image analysis and glaucoma detection using RGB channel
details: BN Reddy, V Ganesan - Computer Science Engineering, 2024
abstract: Glaucoma is a chronic neurological disease that affects the human eye. Its symptoms are not evident and grows gradually such that no individual can recognize the presence or occurrence of glaucoma in the early stages without a medical screening …

title: Real-world Deployment and Evaluation of PErioperative AI CHatbot (PEACH)-a Large Language Model Chatbot for Perioperative Medicine
